SEARCH
Package gw.api.admin

Class BaseAdminUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.admin.BaseAdminUtil
public class BaseAdminUtil extends Object
Utility methods for working with objects in the Admin area of Guidewire's applications. These utilities are generally useful and are not specific to any single application.
Author:
cgross

  • Method Details

    • deleteUser

      public static void deleteUser(User user)
      Deletes the given user and immediately commits the change.

    • deleteActivityPattern

      public static void deleteActivityPattern(ActivityPattern activityPattern)
      Deletes the given activity pattern and commits the change immediately.
      Parameters:
      activityPattern - the pattern to be deleted

    • deleteActivityPatterns

      public static void deleteActivityPatterns(ActivityPattern[] activityPatterns)
      Deletes the given activity patterns and commits the change immediately. Should not throw an exception unless there is a low level database error, but if there is such an error none of the activity patterns will be deleted (the deletions are committed as a single transaction).
      Parameters:
      activityPatterns - the patterns to be deleted

    • deleteAttributes

      public static void deleteAttributes(Attribute[] attributesToDelete)
      Deletes the given attributes and commits the change immediately.
      Parameters:
      attributesToDelete - the attributes to be deleted
      Throws:
      com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException - if any of the attributes is in use. If the commit fails for any reason none of the attributes will be deleted

    • deleteGroup

      public static void deleteGroup(Group group)
      Deletes the given group and commits the change immediately.
      Parameters:
      group - the group to be deleted

    • getGroupsForCurrentUser

      public static List getGroupsForCurrentUser()
      Return a list of all groups of which the current user is a member, sorted by display name.
      Returns:
      a list of group entities

    • getUsersInCurrentUsersGroups

      public static List getUsersInCurrentUsersGroups()
      Return a list of all users who share membership of a group with the current user, sorted by display name.
      Returns:
      a list of user entities

    • deleteBusinessWeeks

      public static void deleteBusinessWeeks(BusinessWeek[] businessWeeks)
      Parameters:
      businessWeeks - the businessWeeks to be deleted

    • deleteHolidays

      public static void deleteHolidays(Holiday[] holidays)
      Deletes the given holidays and commits the change immediately. Should not throw an exception unless there is a low level database error, but if there is such an error none of the holidays will be deleted (the deletions are committed as a single transaction).
      Parameters:
      holidays - the holidays to be deleted

    • deleteOrganization

      public static void deleteOrganization(Organization org)
      Deletes the given organization and commits the change immediately.
      Parameters:
      org - the organization to be deleted

    • deleteRegions

      public static void deleteRegions(Region[] regions)
      Deletes the given regions and commits the change immediately. Also cleans up any UserRegions linked to the given regions, so that no user is left with a reference to a deleted region. Should not throw an exception unless there is a low level database error, but if there is such an error none of the regions will be deleted (the deletions are committed as a single transaction).
      Parameters:
      regions - the regions to be deleted

    • deleteRoles

      public static void deleteRoles(Role[] roles)
      Deletes the given roles and commits the change immediately. Also cleans up any UserRoles linked to the given roles, so that no user is left with a reference to a deleted role. Should not throw an exception unless there is a low level database error, but if there is such an error none of the roles will be deleted (the deletions are committed as a single transaction).
      Parameters:
      roles - the roles to be deleted

    • exportData

      public static void exportData(ExportDataInfo exportInfo, com.guidewire.pl.system.exim.ExportDataSet[] dataSets)
      Export multiple data sets. Writes an XML representation of the given export data to the current HTTP response.
      Parameters:
      exportInfo - the export info
      dataSets - the data sets to be exported

    • exportDataByShortName

      public static void exportDataByShortName(@NotNull @NotNull String shortName)
      This will export to web session the named data set
      Parameters:
      shortName - the name of the dataset

    • exportData

      public static void exportData(ExportDataInfo exportInfo)
      Writes an XML representation of the given export data to the current HTTP response. Should only be used to generate the complete response to a web request, to download the given data to the user. If config service feature is on supported types are excluded from export.
      Parameters:
      exportInfo - the data to be exported

    • exportConfigSupportedData

      public static String exportConfigSupportedData() throws IOException
      Returns XML of all supported admin data types with related entities. Assumes that config service feature is on.
      Returns:
      UTF-8 xml string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if result size is bigger then configured MaximumXmlExportSize
      IOException

    • exportConfigSupportedData

      public static String exportConfigSupportedData(Collection<BaseAdminUtil.ExportQuery> conditions) throws IOException
      Returns XML of entities that match export queries
      Returns:
      UTF-8 xml string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if result size is bigger then configured MaximumXmlExportSize
      IOException
      See Also:
      • BaseAdminUtil.ExportQuery

    • getDefaultCountry

      public static Country getDefaultCountry()
      Returns the default country. This is the current users' default country (User.DefaultCountry), if set, or the server default country (DefaultCountryCode from config.xml).
      Returns:
      the default country if one is defined, null otherwise.

    • getAllRegions

      public static Region[] getAllRegions()
      Returns all the regions sorted by name.

    • getRegionZoneTypes

      public static ZoneType[] getRegionZoneTypes(Country country)
      Returns all the zone types that regions can be created from.
      Parameters:
      country - the country

    • getRegionZoneTypesWithGranularity

      public static ZoneType[] getRegionZoneTypesWithGranularity(Country country)
      Returns all the zone types that regions can be created from.
      Parameters:
      country - the country

    • getRegionZoneTypesForDefaultCountry

      public static ZoneType[] getRegionZoneTypesForDefaultCountry()
      Returns all the zone types that regions can be created from.

    • isZoneConfigurationValid

      public static boolean isZoneConfigurationValid()
      Returns true if zone config is valid, false otherwise.

    • setCurrentUsersLanguage

      public static void setCurrentUsersLanguage(LanguageType language)
      Sets the language of the current user according to the given language type and immediately commits the change.

    • setCurrentUsersLocale

      public static void setCurrentUsersLocale(LocaleType locale)
      Sets the regional settings/formatting locale of the current user according to the given language type and immediately commits the change.

    • isCurrentUserSystemUser

      public static boolean isCurrentUserSystemUser()
      Determines if the current user is the system user.

    • getAllRoles

      public static IQueryBeanResult<Role> getAllRoles()
      Returns all the roles in the system as entities. We could use a query to fetch the roles. But there should be at most a hundred or so roles in the system and they should all be cached so we may as well fetch all the Role entities, which gives us more flexibility for sorting.

    • checkForDuplicateRolePrivileges

      public static String checkForDuplicateRolePrivileges(Role role)
      If the given role has duplicate privileges in its privileges array, returns an error message describing the first duplicate privilege found. Otherwise returns null.

      Using this method to validate the roles array doesn't help overall correctness - the database would reject the duplicate role in any case - but does improve the error message for the user.

    • findAllOrganizations

      public static IQueryBeanResult<Organization> findAllOrganizations()
      Return all the organizations in the system that have zones.
      Returns:
      all the organizations in the system that have zones defined.

    • findAllOrganizationsWithZones

      public static IQueryBeanResult<Organization> findAllOrganizationsWithZones()
      Return all the organizations in the system.
      Returns:
      all the organizations in the system.

    • isDecentralizedAdminEnabled

      public static boolean isDecentralizedAdminEnabled()
      Is decentralized admin enabled for the system.
      Returns:
      true if decentralized admin is enabled for the system, false otherwise.
